== Maven ==
Add a repository:
<pre>
    <repository>
        <id>eeni.snapshots</id>
        <name>TU Delft TBM ENI Archiva Repository</name>
        <url>http://test.eeni.tbm.tudelft.nl:8080/archiva/repository/snapshots</url>
    </repository>  
</pre>

Add a dependency:
<pre>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>agentspring</groupId>
        <artifactId>engine</artifactId>
        <version>0.0.1a-SNAPSHOT</version>
    </dependency>
</pre>
